name: .TAX2020
summary: Learn about .TAX2020 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open TAX2020 files with the desktop version of Intuit TurboTax 2020 in Windows and macOS. To open a TAX2020 file, select File → Open Tax Return....

You can also upload a TAX2020 file to Intuit TurboTax Online when uploading your tax data from the previous year. For example, you can upload a TAX2019 file, but not a TAX2020 file, to TurboTax Online when filing your taxes for the 2020 calendar year. However, if you are filing your 2021 taxes with TurboTax Online, you can then upload your TAX2020 file. To open a TAX2020 file with TurboTax Online, select Tax Tools → Tools, click "Transfer last year's TurboTax return from your computer," then follow the prompts to upload the file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .tax2020 file in Intuit TurboTax 2020
images.caption: TAX2020 file open in Intuit TurboTax 2020
